title: SoftRAID 3.6.6 fully functional version
description:
Fully functional version of SoftRAID version 3.6.6

[From Softraid Website]

For Video Professionals, Server Administrators, Publishers, Graphic Designers, and anyone who relies on the integrity of their data!
SoftRAID 3 takes your existing hard disks and groups them together to give you more speed, capacity and/or instantaneous backup. No more need of a hardware solution to get RAID (Redundant Array of Independent Disks) protection. Now SoftRAID 3 lets your OS X system have all the benefits of RAID with your own Macintosh and hard disks.


For Speed - RAID 0

SoftRAID 3 writes your data across two or more hard disks so your Mac can read the data faster than if it was reading from one disk. This type of volume is called a Stripe Volume. Stripe Volumes are used primarily by Video, Audio and Graphic Design Professionals.


For Safe Backups - RAID 1

SoftRAID 3 can also write identical blocks of data to 2 or more hard disks simultaneously, giving you an instantaneous backup. This group of disks is called a Mirror Volume. Because you can use individual external and/or internal hard disks to make up a Mirror Volume, you have the ability to archive one or more of the disks offsite for increased security. SoftRAID also uses its Stripe technology when reading a Mirror Volume to give you faster reads. Mirror volumes are used by Server Administrators and anyone needing data security!
